Electronic Devices
Select the CORRECT statement(s) regarding semiconductor devices
(A) Mobility of electrons always increases with temperature in Silicon beyond 300 K.
(B) Electrons and holes are of equal density in an intrinsic semiconductor at equilibrium.
(C) Total current is spatially constant in a two terminal electronic device in dark under steady state 
condition.
(D) Collector region is generally more heavily doped than Base region in a BJT.
